Non-binary and non-large media goes here. The sub-dirs within res/assets/ and res/ should be the same.

All binary and/or large resources should go here, as this allows to go "clean-slate" with this data from time to time, to reduce clone size, if done as a git sub-module (which can also be done later). Having it as a git sub-module, also allows to not fetch it at all, if storage or bandwidth is an issue, and it is not required for the task at hand.
Stands for "various", aka "misc."/"miscellaneous"; and should hold files that do not fit into any of the other resource categories.
